definitions.definition: A feeling (other than taste ) perceived inside the mouth .

subdefinitions.definition: The texture of food , drink , etc. as perceived by the mouth .
examples: Dark ale tends to have a creamy mouthfeel .

subdefinitions.definition: The sensations of the tongue when it moves around in the mouth.
examples: I have a much better mouthfeel since my broken tooth has been repaired.

main_definition: A feeling (other than taste ) perceived inside the mouth .
